basic.description: Students will apply technical knowledge, models, and computer-aided design tools to solve an open-ended design problem. The students will work in teams to design, built, and test a prototype device. The lectures provide background on the physics and engineering of the device and introduce the design tools and techniques that will be required to complete the project.
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Engineering Physics Design Project

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: APSC 200 and APSC 293 and (ENPH 253 or ENPH/PHYS 251). Corequisites: APSC 221 and ENPH/PHYS 213 or CISC 271 and ENPH/PHYS 334 or ELEC 252
